links.*: The Lost Road and Other Writings

wikitext.*:
'''''am''''' is a preposition meaning "up, upwards, upon" in [[Sindarin]].<ref>[http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/sindar/dict-sd-en.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] compiled by [[Didier Willis]]</ref> It derives from the [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] [[AM-|AM<sup>2</sup>-]].<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 348</ref>

Examples:
* ''[[Amlach|'''Am'''lach]]'' = "Uprising Flame"
* ''[[Amroth|'''Am'''roth]]'' = "Up-climber"
* ''[[amloth|'''am'''loth]]'' = "Uprising Flowers"
* ''[[amon|'''am'''on]]'' = "Hill"

==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]]: ''[[amba]]''
